statements: SELECT ad_id, ad_name, clicks, impressions, conversion_rate FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE ad_id = 1;
SELECT ad_name, clicks FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE ad_id > 5;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, clicks, impressions FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE clicks > 100 AND impressions < 500;
SELECT * FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE conversion_rate > 0.05;
SELECT ad_name, impressions, clicks FROM ad_performance_metrics ORDER BY impressions DESC;
SELECT ad_name, clicks, impressions FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE clicks > 100 ORDER BY clicks DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT ad_name, conversion_rate FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE conversion_rate > 0.1 ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, clicks, impressions, conversion_rate FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE clicks > 50 AND impressions < 100 ORDER BY impressions ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, clicks, impressions, conversion_rate FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE clicks + impressions > 200 ORDER BY ad_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM ad_performance_metrics ORDER BY ad_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM ad_performance_metrics;
SELECT ad_name, clicks, impressions, conversions, ad_id FROM ad_performance_metrics;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE impressions > 1000;
SELECT ad_id, clicks, impressions, ad_name, conversions FROM ad_performance_metrics ORDER BY conversions DESC;
SELECT ad_name, clicks, conversions, ad_id, impressions FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE clicks > 50;
SELECT ad_name, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE impressions > 100 AND clicks > 50 ORDER BY conversions DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT ad_name, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE ad_id = 10 OR ad_id = 20 ORDER BY impressions ASC, clicks DESC;

SELECT ad_name, adjustments.adjustment_type, adjustment_amount FROM ad_performance_metrics JOIN ad_adjustments ON ad_performance_metrics.ad_id = ad_adjustments.ad_id WHERE adjustment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY adjustment_amount DESC;
SELECT ad_name, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE impressions BETWEEN 100 AND 200 AND conversions > 5 ORDER BY ad_name;
SELECT * FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE clicks >= 30 AND conversions <= 3 ORDER BY ad_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM real_time_ad_performance_metrics;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaign_performance WHERE total_cost > 5000;
SELECT campaign_name, total_revenue, roi FROM ad_campaign_performance ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT ad_id, MAX(clicks) AS max_clicks FROM real_time_ad_performance_metrics GROUP BY ad_id;
SELECT * FROM ad_click_history WHERE device_type = 'mobile' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT ad_name, SUM(impressions) AS total_impressions FROM real_time_ad_performance_metrics GROUP BY ad_name ORDER BY total_impressions DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, AVG(roi) AS avg_roi FROM ad_campaign_performance GROUP BY campaign_name ORDER BY avg_roi DESC;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, conversions FROM real_time_ad_performance_metrics WHERE conversions > 10 ORDER BY conversions DESC, ad_name ASC;
SELECT click_id, timestamp, device_type FROM ad_click_history WHERE device_type = 'mobile' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM real_time_ad_performance_metrics WHERE impressions > 1000 AND clicks > 100 ORDER BY impressions DESC, clicks DESC, ad_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ad_performance WHERE clicks > 100 AND conversion_rate > 0.05;
SELECT ad_id, viewer_location FROM ad_impressions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT ad_id, device_type, clicked_url FROM ad_clicks ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(impressions) AS total_impressions FROM ad_performance GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT ad_id, viewer_location FROM ad_impressions WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM ads;
SELECT ad_name, ad_type FROM ads ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT clicks, impressions FROM ads WHERE ad_type = 'banner';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT group_name, budget FROM ad_groups WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT ad_name, impressions FROM ads WHERE clicks > 50 ORDER BY impressions DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT ad_type, COUNT(*) AS count FROM ads GROUP BY ad_type HAVING count > 1 ORDER BY count DESC;
SELECT ad_name, ad_type, clicks, impressions FROM ads INNER JOIN ad_groups ON ads.id = ad_groups.id WHERE ad_groups.status = 'active';
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM ad_groups WHERE budget > 1000);
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2021-12-31';
